full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Title
National Capital Region (NCR) - Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

### Tender Information
*Solicitation Number:* S4468529
*Tender Closing Date:* June 21, 2023, 13:00:00
*Expected Contract Start Date:* None
*Expected Contract End Date:* None
*Tender Status:* Expired

### Description of Requirement
Temporary Help Services Requirement

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking Temporary Help Services under the following streams and categories:
* 5.1 Computer, application support
* Temporary personnel services

### Invitation to Participate
The following Supply Arrangement holders have been invited to submit a proposal:
* 1019837 Ontario Inc.
* Advanced Chippewa Technologies Inc.
* Altruistic Informatics Consulting Inc.
* Beyond Technologies Consulting Inc.
* BiR Consulting Inc.
* Coradix Technology Consulting Ltd.
* Design Group Staffing Inc.
* Fanar Enterprise Solutions Inc.
* GovInsights Consulting Inc.
* Green PI Inc
* Intelan Consulting Inc.
* MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
* PureLogic IT Solutions Inc
* S.I. Systems ULC
* TECSIS Corporation

### Levels of Security Requirement
* Secret

### Contact Information
For any inquiries or submission of proposals, please contact:
CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
Phone: 613-971-795
Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-G@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-G@forces.gc.ca)

### Important Attachments
Please refer to the following documents for further information:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6433/s4468529-method-1--rf--rfp-%28english-version_0.pdf (English Version)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6433/s4468529-method-1--rf--rfp-%28french-version_0.pdf (French Version)
